links.*: Seek for the Sword that was broken

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|3015|3016|3017|3018|3019|3020|3021}}

==April==
* '''12''' - [[Gandalf]] reaches [[Hobbiton]].<ref name="AppB3">{{App|B3}}</ref>
* '''13''' - [[Gandalf]] reveals to [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] that Bilbo's ring is [[the One Ring]].<ref>{{FR|Shadow}}</ref>
==May==
* '''1''' - [[Gandalf]] meets with [[Aragorn]] at [[Sarn Ford]].<ref name="Strid">{{FR|I10}}</ref>

==June==
* '''19''' - [[Boromir]] and [[Faramir]] receive the [[Seek for the Sword that was broken|riddle]] in their sleep.
* '''20''' - [[Sauron]] [[Sauron's attack on Osgiliath|attacks]] [[Osgiliath]]. About the same time [[Thranduil]] is attacked, and [[Gollum]] escapes.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* Fugitives from the South reach [[Eriador]]. At the southern borders of the [[Southfarthing]] Gandalf receives news of war and defeat and the [[Black Shadow]]. He starts wandering aimlessly and then turns east and north.<ref name=council>{{FR|Council}}</ref>

==Midyear's Day==
* Along the [[Greenway]] [[Gandalf]] finds [[Radagast]] with news from [[Saruman]] that the [[Nazgûl]] have crossed the [[Anduin]] and look for [[the Shire]]. Gandalf goes to [[Bree]] and leaves [[Gandalf's letter|a letter]] for [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] with [[Barliman Butterbur]].<ref name="Strid"/><ref name=council/>

==July==
* '''1''' - At dawn Gandalf leaves Bree for [[Isengard]].<ref name=council/> The [[Nazgûl|Black Riders]] set forth to search for [[the One Ring]]. They pass northward across [[the Wold]]
* '''4''' - [[Boromir]] sets out from [[Minas Tirith]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''10''' - [[Gandalf]] imprisoned in [[Orthanc]].<ref name="AppB3"/>

==August==
* All trace of [[Gollum]] is lost. It is thought that at about this time, being hunted both by the [[Elves]] and [[Sauron]]'s servants, he took refuge in [[Moria]]; but when he had at last discovered the way to the [[West-gate]] he could not get out.<ref name="AppB3"/>

==September==
* Having failed to find the Shire, the Black Riders return to the [[Wold]] empty-handed; messengers from Sauron send them to [[Isengard]].
* Frodo worries about not having heard from Gandalf, as his birthday approaches. Some of his friends, [[Folco Boffin]], [[Fredegar Bolger]], [[Merry Brandybuck]] and [[Pippin Took]] stay in [[Bag End]] and help him pack for his removal to [[Crickhollow]].<ref name="FR|Three">{{FR|Three}}</ref>
* '''18''' - [[Gwaihir]] comes and rescues [[Gandalf]] from [[Orthanc]] in the early hours. The [[Nazgûl|Black Riders]] cross the [[Fords of Isen]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''19''' - [[Gandalf]] comes to [[Edoras]] as a beggar, and is refused admittance.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''20''' - [[Gandalf]] gains entrance to [[Edoras]]. [[Théoden]] commands him to take any horse and go within a day<ref name="AppB3"/> The [[Nazgûl|Black Riders]] come to [[Isengard]]. Frodo's furniture is moved to [[Crickhollow]].<ref name="FR|Three"/>
* '''21''' - [[Gandalf]] meets [[Shadowfax]], but the horse will not allow him to come near, and follows him far over the fields.<ref name="AppB3"/> The [[Nazgûl|Black Riders]] encounter [[Gríma|Gríma Wormtongue]], who tells them of the location of [[the Shire]]. Frodo is anxious for Gandalf's absence and keeps a constant look-out for him.<ref name="FR|Three"/>
* '''22''' - The [[Nazgûl|Black Riders]] reach [[Sarn Ford]] at evening; they drive off the guard of [[Rangers of the North|Rangers]]. [[Gandalf]] overtakes [[Shadowfax]].<ref name="AppB3"/> Frodo celebrates his birthday with friends but without Gandalf.<ref name="FR|Three"/>
* '''23''' - Four Riders enter [[the Shire]] before dawn. The others pursue the [[Rangers of the North|Rangers]] eastward, and then return to watch the [[Greenway]]. Merry and Fatty leave for Crickhollow. [[Khamûl]] comes to [[Hobbiton]] at nightfall. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] leaves [[Bag End]]. [[Gandalf]] having tamed [[Shadowfax]] rides from [[Rohan]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''24''' - [[Gandalf]] crosses the [[Isen]].<ref name="AppB3"/> The hobbits are followed by a Rider on a road near [[Woody End]]; a [[Wandering Companies|Wandering Company]] of [[Elves]] under [[Gildor Inglorion]] returns from [[Emyn Beraid]] and the Rider runs away the chants to [[Elbereth]]. The hobbits camp with the Elves.<ref name="FR|Three"/>
* '''25''' - A Black Rider approaches [[Farmer Maggot]] in [[Bamfurlong]] but he is ousted. The Hobbits later reach him who guides them with his wagon until the [[Bucklebury Ferry]]. The evening they meet Merry and reach [[Crickhollow]]. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] reveals them his plans, already known.
* '''26''' - The [[Old Forest]]. The Hobbits are trapped by the [[Old Man Willow]] but are rescued by [[Tom Bombadil]]. He invites them home.<ref name="AppB3"/><ref>{{FR|Forest}}</ref> Two Riders come to the ''[[Prancing Pony]]'' and talk with [[Nob]] who closes the door; the Riders go towards [[Archet]].<ref>{{FR|Strider}}</ref>
* '''27''' - [[Gandalf]] crosses [[Greyflood]]. Second night with [[Tom Bombadil|Bombadil]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''28''' - The [[Hobbits]] reach the [[Barrow Downs]] and are captured by a [[Barrow-wights|Barrow-wight]] in a [[barrows|barrow]], but are rescued again by Bombadil.<ref>{{FR|Barrow}}</ref> [[Gandalf]] reaches [[Sarn Ford]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''29''' - [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] reaches [[Bree]] at night. [[Gandalf]] visits the Gaffer.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''30''' - [[Crickhollow]] and the [[Prancing Pony|Inn]] at [[Bree]] are raided in the early hours. [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] leaves [[Bree]]. [[Gandalf]] comes to [[Crickhollow]], and reaches [[Bree]] at night.<ref name="AppB3"/>

==October==
* '''1''' - [[Gandalf]] leaves [[Bree]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''3''' - He is attacked at night on [[Weathertop]].<ref name="AppB3"/> [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] in the [[Midgewater Marshes]] sees flashes of light from the battle.<ref>{{FR|I11}}</ref>
* '''4''' - [[Gandalf]] escapes to the north from [[Weathertop]], followed by four [[Nazgûl|Riders]].<ref name=council/>
* '''6''' - The camp under [[Weathertop]] attacked at night; the [[Witch-king]] stabs [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] with his [[Morgul-blade]], causing a [[Morgul-wound]].<ref name="AppB3"/><ref>{{FR|Knife}}</ref>
* '''9''' - [[Glorfindel]] leaves [[Rivendell]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''11''' - He drives the [[Nazgûl|Riders]] off the [[Last Bridge]] of [[Mitheithel]]<ref name="AppB3"/> and leaves a beryl as a token that it is safe.<ref name=council/>
* '''13''' - Aragorn and the hobbits find it, and cross the Bridge.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''18''' - [[Glorfindel]] finds [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] at dusk. [[Gandalf]] reaches [[Rivendell]].<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''20''' - Escape across the [[Ford of Bruinen]].<ref name="AppB3"/> [[Elrond]] and [[Gandalf]] release a flood that drowns the horses of the Riders.<ref name=council/>
* '''24''' - [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] recovers and wakes. [[Boromir]] arrives in [[Rivendell]] at night.<ref name="AppB3"/>
* '''25''' - [[Council of Elrond]].<ref name="AppB3"/>

==December==
* '''18''' - The membership of the [[Fellowship of the Ring|Company of the Ring]] is chosen.<ref>{{FR|II3}}</ref>
* '''25''' - The [[Fellowship of the Ring|Company of the Ring]] leaves [[Rivendell]] at dusk.<ref name="AppB3"/>

==Within the year==
* [[Bilbo Baggins]] completes work on his [[Translations from the Elvish]].<ref>{{FR|Records}}, p. 15</ref>

{{references}}
[[Category:Third Age years|3, Third Age 3018]]
